description: This JavaScript source file initializes and exports a Supabase client instance configured for browser use in a React environment. It imports the createClient function from '@supabase/supabase-js' and sets up environment-based configuration, including warnings if essential environment variables are missing.

methods.name: supabase
methods.description: An immediately invoked function expression (IIFE) that creates and returns a configured Supabase client instance based on environment variables.
